data.title: Are You Afraid of the Dark? by BGMania: A Video Game Music Podcast
data.meta_description:
Episode #170 of BGMania. On today's episode, Bryan is presenting something different... an old concept from the Level Down Games Podcast, but a new concept for BGMania. Check it out, and let me know what you think! Email the show at bgmania@leveldowngames.com with requests for upcoming episodes, questions, feedback, comments, concerns, whatever you want really! Please consider supporting the show by using our Amazon Affiliate link when shopping online!
EPISODE PLAYLIST AND CREDITS

 Epitaph from Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse [Konami Kukeiha Club, 1989]
 BGM 06 from Dead of the Brain [Ryu Takami, 1992]
  Bloodpuppets Battle from Splatterhouse 2 [Eiko Kaneda, 1992]
  Silent for the Insanity from Xak III: The Eternal Recurrence [Yukiharu Urita, 1993]
  Rumor About the Girl from Famicom Detective Club Part II [Kenji Yamamoto, 1989]
  Prairie from Devilish: The Next Possession [Hitoshi Sakimoto, 1992]
  Creepy Forest from Plok! [Tim Follin & Geoff Follin, 1993]
  Giygas Battle from Earthbound [Keiichi Suzuki & Hirokazu 'Hip' Tanaka, 1994]
  Night of the Living Dead from Parodius [Kazuki Muraoka, 1990]
  Fungi Forest at Night from Donkey Kong 64 [Grant Kirkhope, 1999]
  Don't Cry, Jennifer from Clock Tower [Koji Niikura, 1995]
  Scary from The Jungle Book [Tommy Tallarico & Mark Miller, 1994]
  Lethal Gas from Jurassic Park Part 2: The Chaos Continues [Dean Evans, 1995]
  Scooby-Doo Theme from Scooby-Doo! Classic Creep Capers [Robert Baffy, 2001]

Episode #330 of BGMania: A Video Game Music Podcast. Today on the show, Bryan and Bedroth from RPGera go back to a topic that hasn't been visited in quite some time on this show, and is perfectly timed with this weekend's WrestleMania XL festivities! Let's talk wrestling games once again, and make some predictions for this weekend at the end. Email the show at bgmaniapodcast@gmail.com with requests for upcoming episodes, questions, feedback, comments, concerns, or whatever you want!
